RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: isHeader
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Is this a header line containing summarized data about a material

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: commentToExecution
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Comment to execution, e.g. in case of rework.

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: batchID
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Batch ID of the identified sublot or list of IDs of the allocated batches in header rows

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: sublotID
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: ID of the identified sublot or list of IDs of the allocated sublots in header rows

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: logisticUnitID
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: ID of the identified logistic unit

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: batchSublotDisplStr
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: display string of identified or allocated sublots and batches

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: accountedQty
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The accounted quantity for this material

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: plannedQtyWithLimits
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Planned quantity with limits for this material

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: plannedQtyDisplString
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Planned quantity display string without limits for this material

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: accountingStatus
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Accounting status (out of range and accounting complete) for this material

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: localIdentified
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: true if this phase instance has identified the sublot

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: Result
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: CONTINUE: The value is CONTINUE if phase was completed with the Continue option button. DONE: The value is DONE if phase was completed with the Done option button.
